author: controlcthenv
content: I made a PR which adds an initial docusaurus page with all the old mds moved over. As I am reading through your past hackMDs I was also planning on adding them to that repo if you think it'd be helpful?

author: kevaundray
content:
Hi,

Thanks for the PR. Currently if changes are made to the repo and pushed, it will compile and re-deploy the website, can you modify the CI workflow to do this for docusaurus?

RE the HackMd's, it would be good to have that information there, I'll revisit issue #2 re structure of the website (not 100% satisfied with it) and we can add them in a separate PR. Feel free to opine on what you think would make a good structure for those who have no experience with verkle tries, even broadly. 

We can start off by looking at the ethereum.org docs here : <https://ethereum.org/en/developers/docs/> to see what categories are included and the structure that was chosen (It may or may not be suitable for us)
